aboutSection.headline: Blue Line Services Company (Blue Line) leads as the foremost regional liner and feeder operator across the Middle East and beyond
aboutSection.headDescription:
Blue Line Services company was established in 2023 with the mission to connect regional ports seamlessly and catalyze trade across the Middle East, India, and East Africa. Our strategic goal aligns with Saudi Arabia's vision to become a global logistics hub, underlining the Kingdom's premier position in leading multiple high-growth industrial sectors. We are addressing the 'white space' in the region's maritime sector by offering the first-of-its-kind feeder and regional liner shipping services.

Blue Line is creating new trade lanes and delivering end-to-end shipping solutions, connecting key transshipment routes in the Arabian Gulf, Red Sea, and beyond by delivering cost-effective and efficient logistics services that drive transformational trade growth.

The word "Folk" in Arabic evokes a deep maritime legacy, symbolizing a large sea vessel traditionally used for transporting cargo and conducting trade voyages, embodying strength, forward movement, and clear purpose, qualities central to our company's vision. Our visual identity draws inspiration from traditional Najdi geometric patterns and maritime signal flags, blending cultural authenticity with themes of communication, navigation, and purposeful progress.
aboutSection.descOne: Blue Line Services company, was established in 2023, with the mission to connect regional ports seamlessly, and catalyze trade across the Middle East, India, and East Africa.
aboutSection.descTow: Our strategic goal is aligned with Saudi Arabia's vision to become a global logistics hub, underlining the Kingdom’s premier position in leading multiple high-growth industrial sectors.We are addressing the ‘white space’ in the region’s maritime sector by offering the first-of-its-kind feeder and regional liner shipping services.
aboutSection.descThree: Blue Line is creating new trade lanes and delivering end-to-end shipping solutions, connecting key transshipment routes in the Arabian Gulf, Red Sea, and beyond, by delivering cost-effective and efficient logistics services that will drive transformational trade growth.
aboutSection.descFour: in Arabic evokes a deep maritime legacy, symbolizing a large sea vessel traditionally used for transporting cargo and conducting trade voyages, embodying strength, forward movement, and clear purpose, qualities central to our company's vision. Our visual identity draws inspiration from traditional Najdi geometric patterns and maritime signal flags, blending cultural authenticity with themes of communication, navigation, and purposeful progress.

ceoSection.label: Foreword from the CEO
ceoSection.headline: Saudi Arabia has a strong ambition to harness its strategic geographical position to become a globally connected logistics hub, establishing itself at the heart of multiple industries, including shipping.

body.first: Blue Line was born out of this ambition and will play a critical role in making it a reality. The company fills a void in the regional maritime shipping market – offering the first feeder and liner services from Saudi Arabia, with a fleet of ships, including the first-Saudi flag container vessel owned by Blue Line.
body.second: Harnessing essential connections with key transshipment routes across the region and beyond, Blue Line's liner services catalyze regional trade and create new opportunities for businesses to connect with fast-growing markets in India, the Arabian Gulf and along the Red Sea.
body.third: Our commitment is to provide reliable, future-ready shipping solutions that strengthen the Kingdom's position at the forefront of global logistics.

ceoSection.name: Poul Hestbaek

servicesSection.label: Services
servicesSection.subtitle: Independent feeder operations seamlessly link smaller ports to larger hubs while our end-to-end shipping solutions create new trade opportunities across the region.

logistics.title: Freight and Shipping Logistics
logistics.body: Our coastal and regional liner services synchronize schedules, consolidate cargo, and manage customs documentation so partners stay focused on their supply chain priorities.

routes.title: New Trade Routes from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
routes.body: Dedicated feeder routes extend the Kingdom's ports to global networks, accelerating time-to-market for export goods while ensuring reliable connectivity for inbound cargo.
routes.figureAlt: Stacked Blue Line containers positioned at a port

technology.title: Integration of World-class Technology
technology.body: Smart port technologies, paperless processes, and real-time visibility tools streamline operations, enabling data-driven decisions across every voyage.
technology.figureAlt: Blue Line vessel underway viewed from the bow

points.point1: Strategic location at the heart of global trade routes, supporting the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's ambition to become a global logistics hub
points.point2: Enhanced supply chain transparency and reliability through agile local and regional connectivity
points.point3: Committed to sustainable shipping practices, in alignment with the IMO's target of 40% Greenhouse gas (GHG) reduction by 2030
points.point4: Efficiency steers our endeavors, charting the course for groundbreaking industry standards
points.point5: Our vessels, schedules, and routes are customized to meet the unique preferences of our customers
points.point6: Dedicated to advancing skills, employment, and career growth within the maritime sector of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

aboutPage.sectionTitle: Building a Global Logistics Hub through Transformative Shipping Initiatives
aboutPage.sectionBody: Folk Maritime spearheads the journey towards positioning Saudi Arabia as a global logistics hub. Leveraging the country's distinctive geographic advantage on the Red Sea and Arabian Gulf, our strategic endeavors intend to improve connectivity, optimize logistics efficiency, and reinforce sector capabilities. We are committed to maritime sustainability, adhering to the IMO's target of 40% GHG reduction by 2030. We also support transformative technologies and the uptake of alternative zero—and near-zero GHG fuels. As a leading regional player in the maritime feeder and liner services, we actively strive to increase private sector participation in industries reliant on seamless logistics. Aligned with Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 objectives, our commitment extends to enhancing export, re-export, and domestic cargo volumes, building a prosperous and influential future for the nation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: To deliver flexible and reliable solutions for our customers and create value for our shareholders.

customer.title: Customer Focus | Connecting Your Focus to Customer Success
customer.body: We prioritize our customers' needs, ensuring we meet their expectations through a balance of personal attention and efficient technology, striving to build strong, lasting relationships.

integrity.title: Integrity | Building Bridges of Trust: Integrity in Every Action
integrity.body: We are committed to transparency, honesty, and accountability, striving to make ethical decisions that positively impact our stakeholders, our community, and the world around us.

innovation.title: Innovation | Driving Excellence: Innovation, our north star
innovation.body: Experience the future of ship management and service with our advanced IoT and technology solutions, delivering cost efficiency and innovative shipping solutions to the benefit of our customers.

sustainability.title: Sustainability | Sailing Towards Tomorrow: Sustainability in Action
sustainability.body: Dedicated to minimizing our environmental impact through fuel-efficient vessels and cleaner operations, extending this commitment to sustainable practices in our workplaces.

leaders.title: Meet our leaders
leaders.body: Our dedicated and inspiring leaders have charted a transformative path, inviting us to join their shared endeavors.

slide1.title: Decarbonization in Motion
slide1.desc: Investing in fuel‑efficient vessels, voyage optimization, and data‑driven operations to lower emissions across our network.

slide2.title: People, Safety, Community
slide2.desc: Embedding a safety‑first culture while supporting talent development and community initiatives across our ports.

slide3.title: Governance With Purpose
slide3.desc: Transparent governance and responsible procurement that align with Vision 2030 and international best practices.

careersPage.title: Join our Team
careersPage.intro: At Folk, our pursuit of excellence is steadfast. Whether you're a seasoned professional or just beginning your career, if you have the drive and determination to thrive in the fast-paced world of global shipping and logistics and are excited to collaborate with our exceptional team. Find out more about working and growing with us.

why.title: Why Blue Line
points: Meaningful work shaping trade across the Middle East and beyond
A culture built on integrity, learning, and collaboration
Opportunities to grow your career across functions and regions

life.body: We combine maritime heritage with a modern, tech‑enabled mindset. You’ll find supportive teammates, clear goals, and space to innovate.

careersPage.LIFEATFOLKDesc: Begin a journey of continuous learning in one of the world’s most crucial industries.
careersPage.LIFEATBLUEiNTORO: Folk is not just a workplace; it's a vibrant community where every voice matters, creative freedom thrives, and your career growth is paramount. We are dedicated to creating a dynamic culture that fosters collaboration, cultural diversity, and champions work-life balance.
careersPage.valuesTitle: Our values are rooted in our DNA.
careersPage.valuesDesc: An organization like ours is guided by a steadfast set of values. Here’s what makes Folk stand out from the rest:
careersPage.SustainableDesc: Innovating responsibly, we develop sustainable solutions for a thriving future.
careersPage.ImpactDesc: We are committed to ensuring that every action contributes to positive societal change.
careersPage.centricityDesc: Our relentless pursuit of excellence puts our customers first, centered around tailored solutions and exceptional experiences.
careersPage.WorkingTogether: Working together towards a shared vision.
careersPage.WorkingTogetherDesc: As we look for new candidates to join our growing team, we are mindful of each candidate's unique journey and distinctive skills. Your potential is our focus. We look forward to welcoming you into our dynamic team, where your skills align with our forward-thinking approach to work.
careersPage.applicationprocess: We are here to guide you along the application process.
